column1: Smoque BBQ////The staff here is nice
column2: but the lines are long. They work at a breakneck speed
column3: but it's a popular place and there isn't any room to stand to wait for your order. Menu choices are few
column4: and the price is high. All in all
column5: I would recommend it. For those that travel from other cities to try this
column6: are you crazy? It's good if you're in the neighborhood.
